slides.title: Fortress
slides.description: Enterprise-grade cybersecurity solutions that protect your business from evolving threats.

slides.title: Business
slides.description: Advanced threat detection and real-time protection for your digital assets.
slides.description2: Stay ahead of cyber threats with our expert team.

paragraphs: AWA Cyber is a premier cybersecurity firm dedicated to protecting businesses from evolving digital threats. With decades of combined experience, we've safeguarded hundreds of organizations across critical industries.

From penetration testing to security audits, our certified professionals blend strategic insights with industry-leading methodologies to identify vulnerabilities and strengthen your unique security posture.
aboutSection.imageAlt: AWA Cyber experts collaborating inside a security operations center

clientsSection.description: We're proud to protect some of the world's most innovative companies with tailored cybersecurity programs.

servicesSection.description: Protecting your digital assets with enterprise-grade cybersecurity services tailored to your industry.

cards.title: Penetration Testing
cards.description: Identify vulnerabilities before attackers do with comprehensive ethical hacking assessments.

cards.title: Security Audits
cards.description: Complete evaluation of your security posture with prioritized recommendations for improvement.

cards.title: Web Security
cards.description: Protect critical web applications from OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities using advanced testing.

cards.title: Network Security
cards.description: Secure your network with continuous monitoring, firewalls, and intrusion detection systems.

cards.title: Cloud Security
cards.description: Safeguard AWS, Azure, or GCP environments with best practices, compliance, and 24/7 monitoring.

cards.title: Security Training
cards.description: Empower teams with awareness programs and hands-on cyber defense simulations.

projectsSection.description: Explore our recent cybersecurity projects and see how we've helped organizations strengthen their defenses.

primaryProject.title: E-Commerce Platform Security
primaryProject.summary: Comprehensive penetration testing and security hardening for a major e-commerce platform, protecting customer data and payment systems.

whyChooseSection.description: We deliver cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions backed by expertise, proven methodologies, and commitment to excellence.

features.title: Certified Experts
features.description: Our team holds CEH, OSCP, CISSP, and other industry-leading certifications.

features.title: Proven Track Record
features.description: 500+ successful projects across diverse industries with 100% satisfaction rate.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Round-the-clock monitoring and rapid incident response when you need it most.

features.title: Tailored Solutions
features.description: Custom strategies designed for your specific business needs and risk profile.

whyChooseSection.imageAlt: Cybersecurity professional holding a digital lock hologram

testimonialsSection.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear from the businesses we've protected

testimonials.quote: AWA Cyber transformed our security posture. Their penetration testing identified critical vulnerabilities we didn't know existed. Highly professional Team
testimonials.name: John Davis

testimonials.quote: Outstanding service! Their cloud security audit helped us achieve ISO 27001 certification. The team is knowledgeable, responsive, and truly understands enterprise security
testimonials.name: Sarah Martinez

testimonials.quote: We've worked with several security firms, but AWA Cyber stands out. Their comprehensive approach and detailed reporting gave us actionable insights to improve our security
testimonials.name: Michael Roberts

testimonials.quote: The best investment we made this year. Their 24/7 monitoring and rapid incident response prevented a major breach. Cannot recommend them enough!
testimonials.name: Emily Kim

testimonials.quote: Professional, thorough, and extremely competent. Their security training program educated our entire team on best practices. Worth every penny!
testimonials.name: David Lee

testimonials.quote: Exceptional expertise in network security. They implemented advanced IDS/IPS that has been running flawlessly. Their support team is always available when needed.
testimonials.name: Amanda Brown

technologiesSection.description: We leverage industry-leading tools and technologies to deliver comprehensive security solutions.
technologiesSection.toolsSubtitle: Advanced tools for comprehensive security assessments

howItWorksSection.description: A proven methodology that delivers comprehensive security solutions

steps.title: Consultation
steps.description: We discuss your security needs, current infrastructure, and business goals to understand your unique requirements.

steps.title: Assessment
steps.description: Comprehensive analysis of your systems, networks, and applications to identify vulnerabilities and security gaps.

steps.title: Implementation
steps.description: Deploy security solutions, fix vulnerabilities, and implement best practices tailored to your environment.

steps.title: Monitoring
steps.description: Continuous 24/7 monitoring, regular updates, and ongoing support to maintain your security posture.

securityModal.title: Ready to Secure Your Business?
securityModal.description: Don't wait for a security breach to take action. Get a comprehensive security assessment and protect your business from cyber threats today.
securityModal.privacy: Your information is secure and confidential
